description:
Guaranteed to keep you dry on your next big water adventure. The Axiom drysuit is made of GORE-TEX® pro fabric with Cordura® panels in the ankles for abrasion resistance. Integrated socks keep your feet dry and warm, while the relief zipper is a great convenience afloat and ashore. Front entry makes for easy in and out.

  • GORE-TEX Pro is quiet, comfortable, and durably waterproof and breathable
  • Cordura® reinforced inner ankle for increased durability
  • Factory-sealed seams for waterproofness
  • Dual-adjustment overskirt with a hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene waistband creates a watertight seal to sprayskirt tunnels
  • GlideSkin™ neoprene overcuffs with latex neck and wrist gaskets
  • Self-draining mesh holes under wrist and neck
  • Front relief zipper with drop seat
  • GORE-TEX Pro socks keep your feet dry and warm
name: NRS Axiom Gore-Tex Dry Suit - Women's
